content: beautiful crochet baby blanket pattern with with a pretty ripple texture that resembles soft bobbles very easy to make and looks fantastic done in variegated yarn i chose wondersoft merry-go-round and the pinks and peaches reminded me of fruit salad chews that i used to buy as a child so pretty the main pattern has only 2 basic stitches so making this pattern ideal for beginners the format is uk crochet not us please refer to a uk stitch guide and not youtube if unsure of stitches and you will need 1 x 200g dk and a 6mm crochet hook and also a 5mm for border i used wondersoft merry-go-round dk for this blanket but any dk will do finished measurements approx 54cm x 70cm 21 x 27 additional pdf pattern added for the lemon and white blanket this blanket is a little bigger at 61cm x 71cm and you will need approx 300 dk and a 6mm hook it also has a different border to the fruit salad blanket although the main blanket pattern is the same the price also remains the same so win win 2 blankets patterns for the price of one
